amendment.description: To ensure that tribal members receive scientifically effective health promotion services.

action.text: Proposed amendment SA 4024 withdrawn in Senate.

Amendment SA 4024 proposed by Senator Coburn to Amendment SA 3899. (consideration: CR S996-1004, S1040; text: CR S997-999) To ensure that tribal members receive scientifically effective health promotion services.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 4024 proposed by Senator Coburn to Amendment SA 3899.
